Text: Election Day Cc Mark Thank goodness the election is almost over We ought to have a few weeks of peace before someone will start working for The poles have been swamped today and I guess they expect the biggest vote in the last years I am glad the election is nearly overafter almost years I have heard enough I got a new tooth inlay this morning and then voted about and already our precinct had had over votersyour mother was one as she went before she went to the store I dont know who she voted for as yet I was thinking of putting up some cute sign like Monica says Back Bill Nader says A vote for me is a vote for Bush Be sure to get behind the right BushGore is a Kunkle Head or Gore Gore However I decided to put my halo back on You realize I am joking of course I watched the NorthwesternMichigan game last saturdayit had to be the most exciting college game I have ever seen NW lost the ball on downs when their star runner he had gained yards running dropped a pass in the endzone with no one within yards All Michigan had to do was run the clock down left in game so I turned to ESPN to try to get a Lehigh score I finally did and I never went back to the NWMich game I learned just as I turned the radio off to sleep about hours later that NW had recovered a fumble and scored on a pass to win NW had beaten Minnesota the week before on a Hail Mary pass of yards on the last play of the game Incidentally Lehigh had beaten Colgate and they are now I know you are looking forward to seeing Calvin I wish I could be a mouse to see that meeting I had better leave now Your Mother said I should send her love I add my love to that DAD
Toms Alaska Trip Mother TelephoneAll Tom is flying to Alaska tomorrow Dec and will be back Xmas His telephone in Alaska is Also we have added a new phone line here The other phone is operating

no subject Cc I bet you are having fun showing Calvin and his friend around Jeff called about a week ago and your mother and I had a nice talk with him It sure was good to hear from him Leigh is playing Western Illinois in Macomb IL in the first round of the NCAA Class AA football playoffs I am going down to see the game Friday and will stay over Saturday and come home after the game Al Pedrick fraternity brother works at Lehigh in his retirement is coming in with the team and I will spend spare time with him Lehigh was seeded of and Western is ranked th Should be a good game The championship is scheduled in Chattanooga on December and I hope I will have reason to go I will keep you advised MOTHER and I send LOTS of LOVE and KISSES DAD
no subject Cc Thanks for pointing out my dumb mistake I apparently hit an extra key It should be It will show in the phone book under your mothers name DAD

Email Cc Mark Thank you for your nice message The reference to Macomb was my trip down to the Western U game on Nov I thought I told you about the Lehigh runaway Uncle Dave went to Knox College in Galesburg and I went thru the Knox campus and commented to Dave The game so inspired me I went to the Delaware game on Dec and came back to Earth as Lehigh lost The score was higher than the quality of the game Indicated but the best team won Delaware lost yesterday to Georgia Southern who will play Montana U next Saturday for the NCAA Class Championship I will be looking forward to the second newsletter Mother and I cleared out last Friday as two young ladies came in to clean our Condo for the first time They did a super job and we are going to have them come every two weeks We will not have to do any heavy work from now on I have joined the Kiwanis Golden K which meets weekly and is a group of OVER retirees Should be fun as I already know many of them I got a list of the Senior Courses for the Spring semester I will register early to make sure I get the computer course and learn how to use this thing fully I will on line again soon Mother and I send LOTS OF LOVE AND KISSES DAD
CongratulationsJeff We just saw the great news CONGRATULATIONS Your Mother and I are so proud We send you LOTS of LOVE and KISSES MOTHER and DAD

NBC Business TV morning show Cc Jeff We did not want disturb you this morning We wanted to tell you we saw your interview on NBC business cable station When we left you to try to see your report on CNN we could not find it Our cable station must not carry it We did not want to disturb you and hope we didnt as we know you must be swamped with all that is going on now In any case we think you did a fine job on the NBC report I believe all the problems will get cleared though I am no expert Mother and I both send you lots of love DAD

Wedding Pics Cc Hi Sukran and Mark We got the Wedding pictures and looked at all of them We think we identified most of the people They are wonderful We are looking forward to more I got back from the high school reunion in new Kensington Sunday I have been resting ever since Saw more people than I thought I would and visited many locations of old memories I enjoyed it all but very tiring We will keep in touch Mother and I send Lots of Love and Kisses to both of you Mother and Dad

Reunion Report Cc Jeff I returned home from a weekend visit to New Kensington and Pittsburgh as I attended my th High School Reunion About class members were there The houses I grew up in and the old Neighborhoods are much smaller than I remember the hills are higher and steeper than I remember and my former classmates are much older than I I have slept hours each night since I am back and am almost rested Thank goodness I flew to Pittsburgh as I would really would have been a basket case if I had driven I did have a good time Jeff I have been keeping up with your problems in California thru various business web sites The pie incident sure points out the mentality of some of Enrons critics You may end up a martyr before it is all over From what I can observe the Californians are getting little sympathy outside their own state I am sure Enron is getting a lot of undeserved criticism but I believe most think it is their own fault I only hope the whole mess blows over so you can turn your full attention to you normal pursuits Both Mother and I send our love DAD

no subject Cc Hello Sukran and Mark We sure enjoyed you Email on the wedding and Italy We are sure you had a great time Not much new here The Sox have made a great recovery but I am afraid it might be a little late They have too many on the injury lists including Frank Thomas out for most of the rest of the season They did take the series from the Cubs but the Cubs have been playing over their heads and are not as good as their record indicates I have been busy getting a new microwave oven as the old one gave up after years service I bought a new one and have a man lined up to install it over the weekend I am going back to New Kensington for my th anniversary of my graduation on June and After several weeks of the coolest Spring I can remember the heat has arrived Yesterday and the day before near and more expected MOTHER and I send the both of you LOTS of LOVE and KISSES DAD
Happy Birthday Cc Dear Mark Because of the excitement of the wedding we almost forgot to wish you a Happy Birthday We also send you and Sukran All of our Love Dad and Mother

Welome Back to Turkey Cc Hello Sukran and Mark Welcome back to Turkey I hope the weath weather is better in Turkey than here as it has been cold for spring Temps in the s during the day and while we have had some sunny days there has been plenty of rain I have been busy with my Golden K Club Senior Citizen Kiwanis We help with a picnic for mentally retarded children read to needy preschool children help at mentally retarded track meet go to weekly meetings and etc I am told May is the busiest month and it has been but it is almost finished Mother and I have been watching the weather in Italy and imagining what the two of you are doing Sue is back and catching up on their business This week besides Foundry work they have Visited an honorary dinner for one of Jeffs college professors They are also doing some major work on their house The Sweeps are over at WGNTV for a while so now Tom is looking forward to his trip to Alaska a week from Thursday Jeff is still busy with the gas problems so we hear little from him I hear Peter Widman is getting married Though nothing definite I hear it will be in the fall Nothing else for now Let us hear from you In the meantime WE SEND BOTH OF YOU LOTS of LOVE and KISSES MOTHER and DAD

New Scanner Cc Dear Mark With the help of my instructor I got a copy of your Turkish article Can you mail me a translation as I am a little rusty with my Turkish Also I am assuming that is a piece of chalk in your hand as I assume you dont want me to give you a lecture on the dangers of smoking cigarettes The telephone number of the Comfort Suites next to Paytons is I also got your Email with the Flight number thank you Tell Sukran we are looking forward to meeting her next month We will not be at the airport as we couldnt get close to you until you get through customs and you will want to pick you car up then If for some reason you would like us there just say the word and if you do get held up at the airport give us a call Please keep us up to date on any new developments We are interested on what is going on at the Istanbul law office particularly how they may effect your position Mother and I send Lots of Love and Kisses to You and Sukran DAD

Your trip Cc Sukran and Mark We had a good visit with Jeff and Rebecca last week and heard the good news about their engagement They left Sunday morning to go back to Houston Our heat wave finally broke last night We had about weeks of close to degree weather every day and the heat index climbed over degrees on many days As with most people we stayed close to home I called the Chicago Motor Club and they will send me maps and other info for your trip up to Minnesota It is a beautiful drive particularly along the Mississippi Dont forget to send me your Flight Number and local takeoff time and I can keep track of your flight location along the way There may be a problem on a foreign flight but I havent heard of one We are sure looking forward to meeting Sukran Mother and I send Lots of Love and Kisses to both of you Dad

Election Day Cc Mark Thank goodness the election is almost over We ought to have a few weeks of peace before someone will start working for The poles have been swamped today and I guess they expect the biggest vote in the last years I am glad the election is nearly overafter almost years I have heard enough I got a new tooth inlay this morning and then voted about and already our precinct had had over votersyour mother was one as she went before she went to the store I dont know who she voted for as yet I was thinking of putting up some cute sign like Monica says Back Bill Nader says A vote for me is a vote for Bush Be sure to get behind the right BushGore is a Kunkle Head or Gore Gore However I decided to put my halo back on You realize I am joking of course I watched the NorthwesternMichigan game last saturdayit had to be the most exciting college game I have ever seen NW lost the ball on downs when their star runner he had gained yards running dropped a pass in the endzone with no one within yards All Michigan had to do was run the clock down left in game so I turned to ESPN to try to get a Lehigh score I finally did and I never went back to the NWMich game I learned just as I turned the radio off to sleep about hours later that NW had recovered a fumble and scored on a pass to win NW had beaten Minnesota the week before on a Hail Mary pass of yards on the last play of the game Incidentally Lehigh had beaten Colgate and they are now I know you are looking forward to seeing Calvin I wish I could be a mouse to see that meeting I had better leave now Your Mother said I should send her love I add my love to that DAD

no subject Cc I bet you are having fun showing Calvin and his friend around Jeff called about a week ago and your mother and I had a nice talk with him It sure was good to hear from him Leigh is playing Western Illinois in Macomb IL in the first round of the NCAA Class AA football playoffs I am going down to see the game Friday and will stay over Saturday and come home after the game Al Pedrick fraternity brother works at Lehigh in his retirement is coming in with the team and I will spend spare time with him Lehigh was seeded of and Western is ranked th Should be a good game The championship is scheduled in Chattanooga on December and I hope I will have reason to go I will keep you advised MOTHER and I send LOTS of LOVE and KISSES DAD

Email Cc Mark Thank you for your nice message The reference to Macomb was my trip down to the Western U game on Nov I thought I told you about the Lehigh runaway Uncle Dave went to Knox College in Galesburg and I went thru the Knox campus and commented to Dave The game so inspired me I went to the Delaware game on Dec and came back to Earth as Lehigh lost The score was higher than the quality of the game Indicated but the best team won Delaware lost yesterday to Georgia Southern who will play Montana U next Saturday for the NCAA Class Championship I will be looking forward to the second newsletter Mother and I cleared out last Friday as two young ladies came in to clean our Condo for the first time They did a super job and we are going to have them come every two weeks We will not have to do any heavy work from now on I have joined the Kiwanis Golden K which meets weekly and is a group of OVER retirees Should be fun as I already know many of them I got a list of the Senior Courses for the Spring semester I will register early to make sure I get the computer course and learn how to use this thing fully I will on line again soon Mother and I send LOTS OF LOVE AND KISSES DAD
Toms Alaska Trip Mother TelephoneAll Tom is flying to Alaska tomorrow Dec and will be back Xmas His telephone in Alaska is Also we have added a new phone line here The other phone is operating
no subject Cc Thanks for pointing out my dumb mistake I apparently hit an extra key It should be It will show in the phone book under your mothers name DAD
CongratulationsJeff We just saw the great news CONGRATULATIONS Your Mother and I are so proud We send you LOTS of LOVE and KISSES MOTHER and DAD
Happy Birthday Cc Mark Because of the excitement of the wedding we almost forgot to wish you a Happy Birthday We also send you and Sukran All of our Love Dad and Mother

Welome Back to Turkey Cc Sukran and Mark Welcome back to Turkey I hope the weath weather is better in Turkey than here as it has been cold for spring Temps in the s during the day and while we have had some sunny days there has been plenty of rain I have been busy with my Golden K Club Senior Citizen Kiwanis We help with a picnic for mentally retarded children read to needy preschool children help at mentally retarded track meet go to weekly meetings and etc I am told May is the busiest month and it has been but it is almost finished Mother and I have been watching the weather in Italy and imagining what the two of you are doing Sue is back and catching up on their business This week besides Foundry work they have Visited an honorary dinner for one of Jeffs college professors They are also doing some major work on their house The Sweeps are over at WGNTV for a while so now Tom is looking forward to his trip to Alaska a week from Thursday Jeff is still busy with the gas problems so we hear little from him I hear Peter Widman is getting married Though nothing definite I hear it will be in the fall Nothing else for now Let us hear from you In the meantime WE SEND BOTH OF YOU LOTS of LOVE and KISSES MOTHER and DAD
